kerbalanders.wordpress.com

coming soon:

So I need more viewers for my website but I have some coming soon content that you may want to know. First, there is going to be less missions because i'm back to work in two weeks... But a mission should be completed at least once per week or so. I'm looking at doing missions to locations that are mysterious like the mohole and Laythe north pole! I am also working on my spaceplane program. So we are going to do more crazy missions since I am hoping to finish getting crew on every celestial body by the end of next week. You can also tag me and give a mission... 

Example

First post

"person"

@DoodlingAstronaut do a mission the kerbin mountains

"Me"

@Person I'm on it

------A few days later-----

The Kerbin Person Mountains exploration mission asked by @Person
